styles.style: .kong-container,.kong-container__wrap{max-width:1200px}.kong-container,.kong-container__column,.kong-column,.kong-page__column{padding-left:15px;padding-right:15px}.kong-row{margin-right:-15px;margin-left:-15px}.kong-section__bg--parallax .kong-section__bg__image{top:-200px;height:calc(100% + 400px)}.kong-videoPopup,.pswp__bg{background-color:#000000}.kong-videoPopup__loading{border-left-color:#ffffff;border-top-color:#ffffff}.kong-videoPopup__close:before,.kong-videoPopup__close:after,.pswp__button--close:after,.pswp__button--close:before{background-color:#ffffff}.pswp__button--arrow--left,.pswp__button--arrow--right,.pswp__counter{color:#ffffff}body,select,input,textarea{font-size:14px;font-weight:400}body,select{color:#6D6D6F}body{line-height:1.3em;font-family:'Poppins'}.kong--mBold,[type='submit'],dt,th{font-weight:500}.kong--bold,strong,b{font-weight:600}.kong--eBold{font-weight:700}h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,.kong-h{line-height:1.3em;font-weight:600}p{font-size:14px;color:#6D6D6F;margin:0px 0px 15px 0px;line-height:1.5em;font-weight:400}.kong-serif,.kong-pSerif p,.kong-iSerif i:not([class]),.kong-hSerif h1,.kong-hSerif h2,.kong-hSerif h3,.kong-hSerif h4,.kong-hSerif h5,.kong-hSerif h6{font-family:'PT Serif'}.kong-serif{font-weight:400;letter-spacing:-0.01em}.kong-entry h1:not([class]),.kong-h1{font-size:40px;color:#101010;margin:35px 0px 20px 0px;line-height:1.3em;font-weight:700}.kong-entry h2:not([class]),.kong-h2{font-size:32px;color:#101010;margin:35px 0px 20px 0px;line-height:1.3em;font-weight:700}.kong-entry h3:not([class]),.kong-h3{font-size:24px;color:#101010;margin:30px 0px 20px 0px;line-height:1.3em;font-weight:700}.kong-entry h4:not([class]),.kong-h4{font-size:16px;color:#101010;margin:30px 0px 20px 0px;line-height:1.3em;letter-spacing:0.05em;font-weight:700;text-transform:uppercase}.kong-entry h5:not([class]),.kong-h5{font-size:13px;color:#101010;margin:25px 0px 15px 0px;line-height:1.3em;letter-spacing:0.05em;font-weight:700;text-transform:uppercase}.kong-entry h6:not([class]),.kong-h6{font-size:12px;color:#101010;margin:25px 0px 12px 0px;line-height:1.3em;letter-spacing:0.1em;font-weight:700;text-transform:uppercase}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.kong-container,.kong-container__wrap{max-width:92%}}@media only screen and (max-width:1200px) and (min-width:769px){.kong-container,.kong-container__wrap{max-width:95%}}
